INFO_TEXT: Zionn transport company - your reliable partner for transporting goods weighing up to 3.5 tons. Located in Krakow, we specialize in efficient, fast, and secure transport throughout Europe. Our company has a license to provide transport services and offers cargo insurance, ensuring full protection for your goods. With our team of professional drivers and experienced logistics, we take pride in delivering high-quality services tailored to the needs of our customers. Whether you need to transport cargo up to 1 ton or other non-standard shipments, we provide real-time cargo tracking. We are ready to offer the optimal solution for your logistics task.With Zionn, you can be confident in the reliability and professionalism of every cargo transport.
